price: ߏ߬ ߟߎ߬ ߡߍ߲ ߠߎ߬ ߦߋ߫ ߕߌߢߍߟߌ ߞߍ߫ ߟߊ߫ ߖߡߊ߬ߣߊ ߞߣߐ߫ ߸ ߊ߬ߟߎ߫ ߘߏ߲߬ ߕߍ߫ ߟߢߊ߬ߟߌ߫ ߞߍ߫ ߟߊ߫
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ يُفۡسِدُونَ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَلَا يُصۡلِحُونَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: alladhīna yuf'sidūna fī al-arḍi walā yuṣ'liḥūna
